comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/33147718@N05] Not sure what they're called in your neck of the woods but those are rowing eights where I did my time in boats.  Sculls were boats where the oarsman/woman had a smaller oar in each hand while those have just one oar per person.  The Yarra was a bigger river than the Thames at Henley as they could only ever race of two boats at the one time.  It looks like a great occasion.

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/swordscookie] I think we have some more images of this event over time - if we put them we'll tag you in :)
